name: Nicolas
description: I am a man who is optimistic,gentle,romantic,confident and faithful,especially in my inner heart. I advocate nice things,I hope in the limited time of life I can hold hands with my lover.I have received strict family education from my late parents.I am responsible and serious with my work and loyal in love,I believe in true love.In my spare time,I like sports,swimming and reading,I have a wide range of hobbies.So if you are willing to get together with me to build and lead our happy and romantic life,please also read my brief profile carefully and see weather I am the person fit into your expect.
